Opening of the History of OpenAI.description: An engaging introduction to the presentation, outlining the history of OpenAI and what the audience will take away from the session.

Founding and Early Vision of OpenAI.layout: Title with Single Bullet Point List:text
Founding and Early Vision of OpenAI.description: Covers the initial establishment of OpenAI, including the organization's foundational principles, goals, and its mission to advance artificial intelligence in an ethical and impactful way.

Major Milestones in Research and Develop.layout: Title with Single Bullet Point List:text
Major Milestones in Research and Develop.description: Explores key research milestones, breakthroughs like GPT models, and OpenAI's major achievements in the field of artificial intelligence.

Transition to a Hybrid Structure.layout: Title with Single Bullet Point List:text
Transition to a Hybrid Structure.description: Details OpenAI's transition from a purely nonprofit organization to a 'capped-profit' structure, highlighting the rationale behind the shift and its implications for AI development.

Ending of the History of OpenAI.description: Concludes the presentation by summarizing the key takeaways and providing a forward-looking perspective on OpenAI's future objectives and challenges.
